name: Realtyna Provisioning
author: Realtyna

sections.description:
This plugin connects your WPL website to Realtyna repository to install packages. You can debug your website or configure it using the pre-defined packages that we created very fast and simple.

To use this plugin you need WPL Real Estate installed and activated.
sections.installation:
For installing Realtyna Provisioning please follow below steps:

  1. Install it either via the WordPress.org plugin directory, or by uploading the files to your server.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
How can I report issues?

Submit a support ticket on Realtyna ticketing system: https://support.realtyna.com/index.php?/Tickets/Submit/RenderForm/18
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

  • Small fixes

1.2.0

  • Automatically logout the provisioning user after 6 hours of inactivity.
  • Automatically logout the provisioning user after logging out from WordPress.
  • Added an option to re-install the package if needed.
  • Added name of logged-in user in all pages.
  • Added logout link in all pages.
  • Improved the forgot password page.
  • Reduced the wait time after login, register, logout, etc.

1.1.2

  • Fixed an issue on importing widgets.

1.1.1

  • Fixed an issue on importing widgets.

1.1.0

  • Added importer libraries to import demo content in theme packages.

1.0.0

  • Initial version released!

short_description: Install WPL packages on your Real Estate website.
description:
This plugin connects your WPL website to Realtyna repository to install packages. You can debug your website or configure it using the pre-defined packages that we created very fast and simple.

To use this plugin you need WPL Real Estate installed and activated.
